verses.verse: But <WG1161> there were <WG1096> <WG5633> false prophets <WG5578> also <WG2532> among <WG1722> the people <WG2992>, even <WG2532> as <WG5613> there shall be <WG2071> <WG5704> false teachers <WG5572> among <WG1722> you <WG5213>, who <WG3748> privily shall bring in <WG3919> <WG5692> damnable <WG684> heresies <WG139>, even <WG2532> denying <WG720> <WG5740> the YY <WG1203> that bought <WG59> <WG5660> them <WG846>, and bring <WG1863> <WG5723> upon themselves <WG1438> swift <WG5031> destruction <WG684>.

And <WG2532> many <WG4183> shall follow <WG1811> <WG5692> their <WG846> pernicious ways <WG684>; by reason of <WG1223> whom <WG3739> the way <WG3598> of truth <WG225> shall be evil spoken of <WG987> <WG5701>.

And <WG2532> through <WG1722> covetousness <WG4124> shall they with feigned <WG4112> words <WG3056> make merchandise <WG1710> <WG5695> of you <WG5209>: whose <WG3739> judgment <WG2917> now of a long time <WG1597> lingereth <WG691> <WG5719> not <WG3756>, and <WG2532> their <WG846> damnation <WG684> slumbereth <WG3573> <WG5719> not <WG3756>.

For <WG1063> if <WG1487> 'Elohim <WG2316> spared <WG5339> <WG5662> not <WG3756> the angels <WG32> that sinned <WG264> <WG5660>, but <WG235> cast them down to SH'ol <WG5020> <WG5660>, and delivered <WG3860> <WG5656> them into chains <WG4577> of darkness <WG2217>, to be reserved <WG5083> <WG5772> unto <WG1519> judgment <WG2920>;

And <WG2532> spared <WG5339> <WG5662> not <WG3756> the old <WG744> world <WG2889>, but <WG235> saved <WG5442> <WG5656> Noach <WG3575> the eighth <WG3590> person, a preacher <WG2783> of righteousness <WG1343>, bringing in <WG1863> <WG5660> the flood <WG2627> upon the world <WG2889> of the ungodly <WG765>;

And <WG2532> turning <WG5077> the cities <WG4172> of Sodom <WG4670> and <WG2532> Gomorrha <WG1116> into ashes <WG5077> <WG5660> condemned <WG2632> <WG5656> them with an overthrow <WG2692>, making <WG5087> <WG5761> them an ensample <WG5262> unto those that after should <WG3195> <WG5723> live ungodly <WG764> <WG5721>;
And <WG2532> delivered <WG4506> <WG5673> just <WG1342> Lot <WG3091>, vexed <WG2669> <WG5746> with <WG5259> the filthy <WG766> conversation <WG391> of <WG1722> the wicked <WG113>:

(For <WG1063> that righteous man <WG1342> dwelling <WG1460> <WG5723> among <WG1722> them <WG846>, in seeing <WG990> and <WG2532> hearing <WG189>, vexed <WG928> <WG5707> his righteous <WG1342> soul <WG5590> from day <WG2250> to <WG1537> day <WG2250> with their unTorahful <WG459> deeds <WG2041>;)

The YY <WG2962> knoweth <WG1492> <WG5758> how to deliver <WG4506> <WG5738> the godly <WG2152> out of <WG1537> temptations <WG3986>, and <WG1161> to reserve <WG5083> <WG5721> the unjust <WG94> unto <WG1519> the day <WG2250> of judgment <WG2920> to be punished <WG2849> <WG5746>:

But <WG1161> chiefly <WG3122> them that walk <WG4198> <WG5740> after <WG3694> the flesh <WG4561> in <WG1722> the lust <WG1939> of uncleanness <WG3394>, and <WG2532> despise <WG2706> <WG5723> government <WG2963>. Presumptuous <WG5113> are they, selfwilled <WG829>, they are not <WG3756> afraid <WG5141> <WG5719> to speak evil <WG987> <WG5723> of dignities <WG1391>.

Whereas <WG3699> angels <WG32>, which are <WG5607> <WG5752> greater in <WG3187> power <WG2479> and <WG2532> might <WG1411>, bring <WG5342> <WG5719> not <WG3756> railing <WG989> accusation <WG2920> against <WG2596> them <WG846> before <WG3844> the YY <WG2962>.

But <WG1161> these <WG3778>, as <WG5613> natural <WG5446> brute <WG249> beasts <WG2226>, made <WG1080> <WG5772> to <WG1519> be taken <WG259> and <WG2532> destroyed <WG5356>, speak evil <WG987> <WG5723> of <WG1722> the things that <WG3739> they understand not <WG50> <WG5719>; and shall utterly perish <WG2704> <WG5691> in <WG1722> their own <WG846> corruption <WG5356>;

And shall receive <WG2865> <WG5697> the reward <WG3408> of unrighteousness <WG93>, as they that count <WG2233> <WG5740> it pleasure <WG2237> to riot <WG5172> in <WG1722> the day time <WG2250>. Spots <WG4696> they are and <WG2532> blemishes <WG3470>, sporting themselves <WG1792> <WG5723> with <WG1722> their own <WG846> deceivings <WG539> while they feast <WG4910> <WG5740> with you <WG5213>;

Having <WG2192> <WG5723> eyes <WG3788> full <WG3324> of adultery <WG3428>, and <WG2532> that cannot cease from <WG180> sin <WG266>; beguiling <WG1185> <WG5723> unstable <WG793> souls <WG5590>: an heart <WG2588> they have <WG2192> <WG5723> exercised <WG1128> <WG5772> with covetous practices <WG4124>; cursed <WG2671> children <WG5043>:

Which have forsaken <WG2641> <WG5631> the right <WG2117> way <WG3598>, and are gone astray <WG4105> <WG5681>, following <WG1811> <WG5660> the way <WG3598> of Balaam <WG903> the son of Bosor <WG1007>, who <WG3739> loved <WG25> <WG5656> the wages <WG3408> of unrighteousness <WG93>;

But <WG1161> was <WG2192> <WG5627> rebuked <WG1649> for his <WG2398> iniquity <WG3892>: the dumb <WG880> ass <WG5268> speaking <WG5350> <WG5674> with <WG1722> man's <WG444> voice <WG5456> forbad <WG2967> <WG5656> the madness <WG3913> of the prophet <WG4396>.

These <WG3778> are <WG1526> <WG5748> wells <WG4077> without water <WG504>, clouds <WG3507> that are carried <WG1643> <WG5746> with <WG5259> a tempest <WG2978>; to whom <WG3739> the mist <WG2217> of darkness <WG4655> is reserved <WG5083> <WG5769> for <WG1519> ever <WG165>.

For <WG1063> when they speak <WG5350> <WG5726> great swelling <WG5246> words of vanity <WG3153>, they allure <WG1185> <WG5719> through <WG1722> the lusts <WG1939> of the flesh <WG4561>, through much wantonness <WG766>, those that were clean <WG3689> escaped <WG668> <WG5631> from them who live <WG390> <WG5746> in <WG1722> error <WG4106>.

While they promise <WG1861> <WG5740> them <WG846> liberty <WG1657>, they themselves <WG846> are <WG5225> <WG5723> the servants <WG1401> of corruption <WG5356>: for <WG1063> of whom <WG3739> a man <WG5100> is overcome <WG2274> <WG5766>, <WG2532> of the same <WG5129> is he brought in bondage <WG1402> <WG5769>.

For <WG1063> if <WG1487> after they have escaped <WG668> <WG5631> the pollutions <WG3393> of the world <WG2889> through <WG1722> the knowledge <WG1922> of the YY <WG2962> and <WG2532> Saviour <WG4990> Yeshuw`a <WG2424> Moshiach <WG5547>, they are <WG1707> again <WG3825> entangled <WG1707> <WG5651> therein <WG5125>, and <WG1161> overcome <WG1096> <WG5754> <WG2274> <WG5736>, the latter end <WG2078> is worse <WG5501> with them <WG846> than the beginning <WG4413>.

For <WG1063> it had been <WG2258> <WG5713> better <WG2909> for them <WG846> not <WG3361> to have known <WG1921> <WG5760> the way <WG3598> of righteousness <WG1343>, than <WG2228>, after they have known <WG1921> <WG5631> it, to turn <WG1994> <WG5658> from <WG1537> the holy <WG40> Mitzvah <WG1785> delivered <WG3860> <WG5685> unto them <WG846>.

But <WG1161> it is happened <WG4819> <WG5758> unto them <WG846> according to <WG3588> the true <WG227> proverb <WG3942>, The dog <WG2965> is turned <WG1994> to <WG1909> his own <WG2398> vomit <WG1829> again <WG1994> <WG5660>; and <WG2532> the sow <WG5300> that was washed <WG3068> <WG5671> to <WG1519> her wallowing <WG2946> in the mire <WG1004>.
